short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert selected date and show popup and clip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This utility helps to convert date strings in any web page into popular timezones of India, UTC, New York and Central

Usage available at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CtbtdtTznCY

Source code: https://github.com/iamdvr/google-chrome-extension-date_to_custom_tz

Complete offline, no data being sent to outside
